about_the_game:
Dive into a world of surprises, where every card flip could be your ticket to victory or trouble.

The prologue showcases a part of the mysterious forest that changes with every game. Can you master the art of strategic card flipping and uncover the first plot mysteries? Get a taste of a larger adventure that combines tactical thinking, luck, and exploration in this captivating roguelike experience.

Features of the Prologue:


  • Strategic Combat: Experience the core gameplay where every decision matters. Learn to choose your cards wisely and plan your attacks carefully.
  • Roguelike Elements: Discover how collecting scrolls can make you stronger.



  • Vibrant World: Explore part of the atmospheric forest with beautiful graphics.
  • Cards: Try out a limited set of cards, giving you a taste of the variety in the full game.



  • First Story Beats: Meet key characters and uncover the beginning of the mysterious plot that unfolds in the full version.
  • Replayability: Each playthrough of the prologue offers a unique experience thanks to the changing forest.



Try out gameplay elements that fans of Slay the Spire, Inscryption, and similar card-based roguelikes will find both familiar and fresh.

name: Forest Dump: Prologue

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8/8.1, 10, 11
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory, DirectX 11 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: Forest Dump: Prologue is a free version of the upcoming roguelike card-flipping adventure game. Explore a mysterious woodland as a fox, meet strange creatures, and uncover the first secrets of your corrupted home in this beautiful journey.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
